text: "Creep" is a 1993 song by Stone Temple Pilots and is the third single from their debut studio album Core. It went to number 24 in New Zealand and number 76 in Australia. ==Track listing== # "Creep" [New Radio Version] - 4:31 # "Crackerman" - 3:12 # "Where the River Goes" - 8:20 ===German track listing=== # Creep # Dead and Bloated # Piece of Pie ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Acoustic rock songs Category:Stone Temple Pilots songs
title: Creep (Stone Temple Pilots song)
